name: Ducklett

evolution.description: Ducklett can evolve into Swanna at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Water Bird Pokémon. When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.
